entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as feeling cold and wishing they'd hurry up.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's and suggests using a Portkey or Apparating to get somewhere quickly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's and reminds Ron that you can't Apparate inside the Hogwarts grounds.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a teacher at Hogwarts and calls out to announce the arrival of the Beauxbatons delegation.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is a school that is mentioned as sending a delegation to Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their conversation about using Portkeys or Apparating.
Hermione is also a friend of Ron's, as she corrects him about Apparating inside the Hogwarts grounds.
Dumbledore is affiliated with Beauxbatons, as he announces their arrival at Hogwarts.
Harry and Hermione are friends, as they are mentioned together in the conversation about Apparating.
